definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: If you're trying to lose weight, join a slimming club.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想減肥，那麼加入塑身俱樂部吧。

sentences.english: That you can target specific problem areas of your body?
sentences.chinese: 或者它可以針對你身體的某一部位進行減肥塑身？

sentences.english: They regard it as a good way to supervise and encourage each other to persevere in body-sculpting .
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲這是監督和鼓勵彼此堅持塑身的好方法。

sentences.english: That is the reason why a pressure garment still needs to be worn three months after the surgery.
sentences.chinese: 因此術後塑身衣需穿三個月就是這個道理。

sentences.english: Just because you join a gym does not mean you will be in shape.
sentences.chinese: 僅僅參加健身房不意味着你就能塑身成功。

sentences.english: This figure-keeping method is enthusiastically pursued by Chinese young men and women now.
sentences.chinese: 這種塑身方式受到中國年輕男女的追捧。

sentences.english: Toning shoes represent the fastest-growing segment of the shoe industry.
sentences.chinese: 健體塑身鞋代表了飛速發展的製鞋工業。

sentences.english: Migrating advanced weight-loss technology and experience overseas.
sentences.chinese: 移植國外先進減肥塑身技術及經驗。

sentences.english: Is the model body things of osmund appearance useful?
sentences.chinese: 薇姿的塑身用品有用的麼？

definition: to lose weight (intentionally)/to slim down/(Tw) to downsize (a business)
to exercise/to keep fit/to work out/physical exercise
healthy and beautiful/to do fitness exercises/abbr. for 健美運動|健美运动[jian4 mei3 yun4 dong4]
